title: Cheap Barcelona city breaks are going from £99pp including your flights
text:

Barcelona is one of those cities that has something for everyone; a brilliant nightlife, diverse culinary scene and heaps of eye-catching landmarks from Park Guell to the Sagrada Familia.

(You can get the lowdown in our Barcelona city guide ).

There's good news if the Spanish city is already on your bucket list too, as you can currently bag some temptingly cheap breaks.

That's because Icelolly is offering Barcelona city breaks from £99pp which include both your hotel stay AND your return flights.

The deal includes a two-night break with a stay at the Catalonia Avinyo hotel, on a room only basis.

The hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter making it an ideal base for sightseeing, not to mention it also offers perks such as a rooftop terrace and gym alongside the spacious rooms with ensuite bathrooms.

You can already book the deal on Icelolly but it's worth noting that the offer is subject to availability.

The price is based on a 10th November 2019 departure from London Gatwick, Stansted or Luton so it's ideal for those who can travel outside of the school holiday dates.

If you do have small kids who aren't in school yet, there's good news as kids aged 2 to 11 years old stay FREE.

(If you do have kids in school, then you may want to check out our round-up of cheap October half term deals instead).

Don't be disheartened if you can't quite make the deal work for you. The good news is that Barcelona can be quite a budget-friendly destination.

For a start there are heaps of cheap hotels in Barcelona to be found, while getting there can be done on a budget - you can find return flights from £23 on Skyscanner .

You may also want to check out our cheap Spain holidays guide for more top tips on nabbing bargains.
description: Cheap Barcelona city breaks are going from £99pp which includes your hotel and flights
